heading: Today
text: Periods of rain and showers, at times heavy this morning, with a localized thunderstorm. Showers diminishing late morning in NY into the Berkshires, and later in the day northeast. Highs in the low to mid 60s. Winds southeast 10 to 20, gusting 30 to 40 mph this morning, becoming south and decreasing to 25 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: A localized evening thunderstorm. Evening showers tapering off south, lingering north overnight. Lows in the low to mid 40s. Winds becoming south to southwest near 10 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Morning clouds giving way to sun south, while clouds, a few stray showers north ending. Some sun afternoon developing, clouds lingering northeast. Highs in the 50s to low 60s. Winds becoming south near 10 mph.
